meanings.definition: The arrangement or plan of something.
meanings.sent1: The layouts of the furniture in the room were carefully thought out.
meanings.sent2: She studied different layouts of the garden before deciding on the final design.
meanings.sent3: The layouts of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a complex layout of ideas and memories.
meanings.sent5: The intricate layout of the city streets confused the tourists.

meanings.definition: The way in which items are arranged on a page or screen.
meanings.sent1: The layouts of the website were user-friendly and easy to navigate.
meanings.sent2: Graphic designers often spend hours perfecting the layouts of magazines.
meanings.sent3: The layouts of the photos on the wall created a beautiful display.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a jumbled layout of words on a page.
meanings.sent5: The layout of the app made it simple for users to find what they needed.
